code: import React,{memo}from"react";import ActivityIndicator from"react-native-web/dist/exports/ActivityIndicator";import Alert from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Alert";import firebase from"firebase/app";import"firebase/auth";import Background from"../components/Background";import{theme}from"../core/theme";import{FIREBASE_CONFIG}from"../core/config";import Toast from'react-native-tiny-toast';if(!firebase.apps.length){firebase.initializeApp(FIREBASE_CONFIG);}var DatabaseAssets=function DatabaseAssets(_ref){var navigation=_ref.navigation;return"hi";};export function IssueCount(){firebase.database().ref('Form/').once('value',function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.val();var items=Object.values(data);var isscount=0;for(var i=0;i<items.length;i++){if(items[i].Status=="False"){isscount+=1;}}console.log("returning issue count: ",isscount);return isscount;});}export function ResolvedCount(){firebase.database().ref('Form/').once('value',function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.val();var items=Object.values(data);var rsscount=0;for(var i=0;i<items.length;i++){if(items[i].Status=="True"){rsscount+=1;}}console.log("returning issue count: ",rsscount);return rsscount;});}export var ProcessingCount=function ProcessingCount(){firebase.database().ref('Form/').once('value',function(snapshot){var data=snapshot.val();var items=Object.values(data);prcounts=0;for(var i=0;i<items.length;i++){if(items[i].Status=="False"){prcounts+=1;}}console.log("returning Processing count: ",prcounts);return React.createElement(Text,null,prcounts," ");});};export default memo(DatabaseAssets);
